summary: RIM THAT HAS DEVELOPED CRACKS IS MANUFACTURED BY EXCEL.  I UNDERSTAND IT IS ALSO USED ON SOME HONDA MOTORCYCLES AND HONDA IS CONDUCTING A RECALL.  I WANT TO KNOW WHY MOTO GUZZI HAS NOT CONDUCTED A RECALL OR OFFERED TO REPLACE THE DEFECTIVE RIMS.  SOMEONE COULD BE SERIOUSLY INJURED OR KILLED IF THIS RIM COMES APART A HIGHWAY SPEED (2000 MOTO GUZZI QUOTA MOTORCYCLE).   *PH   *NLM    **DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT OVER TO ARTEMIS**767674
